article_title: With new reform, Mission Lexington adjusts the health care it provides to the poor
article_text: The free clinic, which provides health care to the uninsured and the working poor, is tweaking its mission because of the nation's new health care law by redefining the population it serves and letting the public know that free care is still needed.
